title: Fix Webflow Dashboard Search Functionality
description: Fix incorrect $derived syntax in AssetsDisplay.svelte that breaks search filtering

stories.title: Fix $derived syntax in filteredAssets
stories.description: The filteredAssets computed value uses incorrect Svelte 5 syntax - it wraps the logic in a function which breaks reactivity. Need to either remove the function wrapper or use $derived.by(). Also need to update line 53 to not call filteredAssets as a function.
acceptance: filteredAssets uses correct Svelte 5 $derived syntax (either inline expression or $derived.by())
Line 53 accesses filteredAssets as a value, not a function call
Search input filters assets by name, type, and status
No console errors when typing in search input
